options.content:
Domain ${__org.name}
Device Freebox : $server

panels.description:
Decibels (dB) is the ratio of output power to input power, expressed as 10*log (power ratio). 

dBm = power in decibels relative to 1mW (1000uW). A reading of 0 dBm is 1mW.
panels.title: Fiber: download - rate & RX power

panels.description:
Decibels (dB) is the ratio of output power to input power, expressed as 10*log (power ratio). 

dBm = power in decibels relative to 1mW (1000uW). A reading of 0 dBm is 1mW.
panels.title: Fiber: upload - rate & TX power

targets.query: SELECT mean(/^bandwidth_.*/) as " " FROM "freebox" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("sfp_alim_ok") AS "_sfp_alim_ok", min(/^sfp_has_*/) AS " " FROM "freebox" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Lan browser : device count per iface

list.description: Datasource to use for this dashboard
list.label: Datasource name
list.name: dsdashboard

list.definition: SHOW TAG values FROM "freebox" with key = "host"
list.label: Server:
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG values FROM "freebox" with key = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG values FROM "freebox_switch" with key = "switch_port" where "host" = '$server'
list.label: Lan switch
list.name: switch
list.query: SHOW TAG values FROM "freebox_switch" with key = "switch_port" where "host" = '$server'
